Element definition: Unique international identifier of the monitoring site in which the data were obtained.
Specification of whether the monitoring site is a WFD monitoring site ('euMonitoringSiteCode') or not ('eionetMonitoringSiteCode').
Value definitions:
eionetMonitoringSiteCode: EIONET identifier;
euMonitoringSiteCode: WFD identifier

Element definition: The year or range of years to which the data applies.
Unique code of the determinand monitored, as defined in the codelist.
Annual emission of nutrients (tonne/year), organic matter (tonne/year) or hazardous substances (kg/year) from a specific source of emissions, aggregated by spatial unit.
Unit of measure for the reported emission value.
Status of the observed value in terms of its availability, relevancy, correctness or specifics of its source category.
Unique metadata identifier of version of the feature or record. Url that points either to the source of the reported data or to a page providing information on the data origin.
Timestamp when the feature or record was created. In case of reported data it's the release date and time of the respective CDR envelope.
Status of the feature or record regarding its registration.
Value definitions:
valid: accepted and valid reported feature or record;
experimental: derived feature or record, e.g. legacy record converted to the new structure by EEA or records with updated spatial identifiers

Element definition: Aditional information or statements regarding the reliability of the feature or record.
Unique identifier of the record in the EEA WISE_SOE database.
